Name: Consequence
About the game: butterfly effect - (noun) - (with reference to chaos theory) the phenomenon whereby a minute localized change in a complex system can have large effects elsewhere. Surely one change shouldn't change everything, right? Play through this thrilling, story-based, psychological horror game, about small inconveniences that you must overcome, by dreaming that something was slightly different. Surely that shouldn't break the whole world and universe...
